description: This file sets up an agent with an AIML model, reads an image file as bytes, and prompts the agent to analyze the image.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with models and handles responses.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image with byte content.

classes.description: A model class for AIML API with specific identifiers.
